reviewText: Our grandson loves these Winnie the Pool stories.  Plays well on our DVD player area 1 and 2 .

This DVD does not work on American DVD players so it is of no use to me.  It will cost me more to return it than I paid for it so I guess I am stuck.  I didn't see anywhere a notice that it was not a local disc.  I don't know if the seller even knew.
